## kl box start

start box using kl.yml configuraiton of the current directory



### Options

```
  -f, --foreground   run in foreground mode
  -h, --help         help for start
  -q, --quiet        quiet output
  -v, --verbose      verbose output
  -h, --help   help for start
```
